1.content:
You are typing words into your computer, focusing on writing a book to show to your editors. Everything seems calm and tranquil for now. You enjoy the task and start to lull into a hypnotic rhythm... when the unpredictable occurs. Suddenly all the windows shatter, the light goes out and the lightning flashes. Wind gushes in dramatically as suddenly the words on the screen shudder and take formation, the static on the screen actually creating a solid foundation for the rest of the inky ooze to flow into... You can witness to your horror the thought process as the body is created out of mere electrons and electric-fuel atoms. You can see the cell structure and a sizzle... then the dying light of the lamp provide your first glimpse of the amazing fact: You summoned your character out of nowhere... The body sizzles once and collapses, fully human... or not?

The creature breathes, taking its first breath as you, the creator are awed and somewhat terrified.
1.title: The amazing thing

11.content: He seemed alive, wait! He's breathing. The most amazing thing about this, other than that fact it happened, was his wings. They were black, the feathers edged in silver. My first thought, I must be dreaming. "Mmm," he groaned, "Where am I?"
11.title: He looks human, but he isn't

111.content: Before we continue, would you like to continue with this storyline, or go for a different one, with a different OC?
111.title: Frozen in place

choices: Offer to delete the "intel", then rewrite his personality and appearance
Offer to delete the "intel", then delete the document, destroying him
1112.content:
Steam cascaded off the figure, who was lying on the floor of your bedroom, about a meter away. You try to focus on him but he seems to blur, before, with a soft whirring noise, he pushes himself upright into a sitting position.

You examine his appearance. Pale white skin, average muscle mass, and piercing blue eyes. Well, one piercing blue eye. Where his right eye should be is a metal cube embedded directly into the eye socket, somewhat crudely, a red ball with a solid yellow area serving as his eye, a tiny camera embedded within, thin blue circuitry spreading out from the construct.

His right arm had also been replaced by a cybernetic version, a smooth dark plates concealing circuits and microservos. His left leg was replaced in a similar manner, the metal foot bearing no toes, simply being a sloped block of metal.

He coughs loudly, once, twice, before he notices you. "Citizen! What district are we in? Quickly!" He barks at you in a thick lower class british accent, leaving you unsure of how to proceed as his face twists into a scowl. "Are you a moron? What district are we in?!"

Grimacing, you wheel your chair to one side and show him your work.

"The fuck? Alright, I'll look at your little essay then. Huh?
Wait a minute, what the shit?!"

He pushes you out of your seat, positioning himself so that his cold steel foot can easily stamp down on your neck if he wishes to.

"You better start fucking explaining, you little Jenari bitch! How'd you get all this intel on me?!"

What do you do?
1112.title: Revolutionary

choices: Pick another name from your list
112.content:
You are startled when your creation seems to regard you with indifference.
"Where am I?" he seems to repeat, then he became aware of his surroundings though his vision was blurry. You take this opportunity to hold him up until his wings unfold fully, about six feet in length and scraping the bookshelves. His glossy wings seem to shimmer with an aura of prestige and honour. He has tanned skin and curly red hair.
"In my h..hou.. House." You stutter as he glares back at you.
"I beseech you, to give me a name. For you are the one who breathed life into me, as Pygmalion did for his own statue of Venus. What is my current name?"
112.title: "My name is..." he began-

1122.content:
"Your name is Timothy," I told him.
He flicked his wings and looked down on me and asked, "And what am I?"
"Why you're a Guardian Angel of course!" I exclaimed.
Timothy folded his magnificent wings and stalked around the room. Turning quickly he glared, his eyes seemed to glow as red as his hair, "Yours?"
Frightened of the change in his eyes I stepped back. He was just so fierce. "No you're not my Guardian Angel."
"Then whose?" he demanded.
1122.title: "Timothy the guardian Angel"

choices: You decide to forget the name and do something else
Continue to think on a name

But the first breath was only out of a shock to the system. It seems the creature that has come to life is the vampiress you have just been writing about. She turns her head up, black hair falling from her face, to stare at you with red, hungry eyes. She tilts her head slightly, almost recognizing you as her creator, but her lips begin to part and you suddenly realize, weren't you just writing about how hungry she was?

Just then...
12.title: She's not human

choices: a bite. (Verin decides to have her snack...and let you live.)
a smile and a kick. (Verin knocks you unconscious and leaves.)
a tackle and a kiss. (Love is a battlefield...)
121.content:
Her name was Verin. I created her as the main protagonist in a vampire novel called Tetra. It was supposed to be an action novel, filled with plenty of suspense and danger. The idea behind it inspired the name. Tetra is an organization of vampire hunters who recruits other vampires to do their dirty work. In the novel, Verin rounds up three other vampires who have their own unique abilities and styles in order to take down Tetra. It doesn't help that the founder and current leader of Tetra...is Verin's father.

Verin was created by fusing human and vampire DNA using a device called Splice. Verin, as soon as she was created, was raised from a young age, and trained in the art of gunfighting. Unfortunately for the researchers at Tetra, Verin became aware of her situation, and decided that enough was enough. She left the Tetra Research and Development Department as nothing but a smoldering pile of ash. Her age at this point was 22.

Verin has long, straight, jet black hair that hangs just over her eyes and stretches down the length of her spine. Normally, she has dark green eyes, but when she gets hungry for some sustenance...they turn a vivid red. Her fangs are hard to see when she's not using her full power, but when she snaps, her fangs are clearly visible. She has ivory skin, slender arms and long legs. She's fast enough to dodge bullets and strong enough to bend steel. She usually wears a skin-tight black combat suit with red lacing and stitching. Over this, she can usually be seen wearing green cut-off jacket with white fox-fur lining, as well as dark blue jeans. A pair black high-heel boots adorn her feet, and she wears on silver earring on her right ear.

Verin is a skilled martial artist and an expert gunslinger. She wields two godly hand cannons appropriately named Devastators. They are modified Automag Vs with extra-large magazines that hold 16 rounds each. Verin uses custom .50 caliber mercury-tipped acidic rounds capable of slicing through most everything and melting anything else. She uses the Devastators with unbelievable accuracy, able to shoot the stem off of an apple from 500 yards away.

Despite the training, torture, and degradation at the hands of her father, Verin is still a good-natured person. She does have sadistic tendencies...but what vampire doesn't have sadistic tendencies? She is indeed capable of making friends and leading allies into battle. She's an eloquent speaker and a good listener. She's as fast with her tongue as she is with a trigger, able to say the right thing at the right time in any situation. She is definitely a force to be reckoned with...and now...she's on top of me.

I was, at that moment, writing a sentence. I believe it went, 'Verin licked her lips, quite ready to sink her fangs into anyone who dared cross her.' You can imagine my concern. Verin did indeed attack me shortly after she appeared...but 'attack' is...a strong word. It wasn't much of an attack in all honesty. It was simply...
121.title: 'Attack' is a Strong Word...

choices: You command Verin to sit on the chair
You don't give Verin any commands

"How may I help you?" she says to you as the vampiress seems rather docile. Her red eyes were crinkled with a smile.

"Wait!" You plead, hands up before you.

She straightens a little, just barely, but you are so familiar with how she moves that you notice. "What?"
1222.title: Yes, but she's just about to pounce

12221.content:
"What if I told you that I could change anything about you?", you begin. "Explain human but make it quick", she replies while still eying you hungrily, more amused by your statement than convinced. "I created you and I can modify you to make you stronger, or faster, or...or anything you wanted really," you explain to the vampiress. "Why eat me when only I have the power to rewrite you so to speak? It would seem like a waste."

The vampiress seems to consider this statement and after a brief pause begins to walk towards you with a sharp toothy grin. She leans in and you cower from her proximity. She laughs chillingly at your fear. "Fine human. I will spare you for now, but know this...", she glares at you. "I have no master. I am your master now and if you don't follow my commands exactly you'll be next on the menu. Understand?"

You shake you head affirming that you understand full well what she can do to you. Why couldn't you have written about something less dangerous? But you have one trick in your back pocket: you may be able to distract the vampiress long enough to rewrite her to make her harmless. If she thinks that you are fulfilling her wishes you may have a chance. "Its time for my first change to this body!" the vampiress snarls at you while you fumble for your notepad. "I want to be able to walk in the sun without disintegrating", she commands. You are about to make it happen when you decide to...
12221.title: Playing Genie to a Vampiress

choices: Let her be disintegrated in the sun, destroying her
122212.content:
You will have to be careful. She will not be tricked easily, you created her to be intelligent. You take your seat in front of the computer screen. As she stands behind you watching, you begin to type.

"I am losing my patience, type faster," she hisses in your ear. You tense in response to the menace in her voice but do as she says.

"It is done," you speak with a cofidence that you do not feel. If you show weakness or uncertainty now, your plan will fail.

She stands still for a moment as if she is concentrating. She looks at her body. "I don't feel any different. How do I know that it worked?" she asks.

"You will have to test it. There," you say as you point to an open window, "stand in front of that window."

She eyes the bright ray of sunshine that is cast upon the floor. She hesitates as she nears the sunlight and turns to glare at you. Amazingly, you remain calm and look her in the eye. You gesture for her to step forward, just one more step and she will be there. As she inches forward, you turn your attention back to your keyboard. You already have the words in your mind, you must move quick. You cannot afford to make a mistake now. Quickly, before she notices you begin to type....
122212.title: Trick her

With your heart beating at a breakneck pace you quickly typed in one sentence
"However she would never harm the one who created her." The vampiress stopped mid lunge; this simple change had turned her completely docile looking at you. "Please sit down and be quiet for now, or you will hurt my feelings..." You muttered scared of what she would do, however she followed your orders to a point. 12221221.title: You were making her personality more gentle and...

122212211.content:
You needed her to be a little more kinder towards you and to more importantly, avoid becoming some meal to her blood lust. It was then that you typed in the following phrase "And she is madly in love with the one who created her and will do anything to make them happy."

You looked back at the vampiress as she seemed to be staring at you with hearts in her eyes as she walked up to you and stroked your arm. "I apologize for my behavior earlier master, I'm not sure what came over me. I hope you aren't too upset with me." she said.

It was at this point you realized that you have a literal demon of the night at your beck and call who will do anything you ask her to. Even if it meant murdering anyone who tries to get in your way. You look at your creation with joy. You decided to test your creation by having her go and get you a soda from the fridge. It was at this moment that she went right on over and came back with said soda before putting it into your hands. You grin big since you know she will forever be your lovesick puppet.
122212211.title: Make her fall madly in love with you

122212212.content:
As you think, a sadistic smile slowly etches itself across your face. You had the vampire, and you could modify her simply by typing. You had infinite possibilities at your fingertips. Therefore, why not do what all people with this much power do and try to take over the world?

Eyeing the vampiress sat on your bed, glaring at you, you lick your lips, and turn back to your computer. How exactly could you change her to allow you to take over the world? Obviously, you'd need to secure her complete loyalty, first and foremost.

She will never act against the one who created her, and will follow all their commands, unless she believes that following a command may bring harm to her creator.

There we go. Complete loyalty, with some room for independent thought and capacity to point out dangers in your commands and plans. Looking back at the vampiress, you notice that her demeanor has changed. Where before she glared at you, she now seemed eager to serve, a small smile on her face and her eyes broadcasting her sunny attitude.

Blinking, you realise something.
"Hm. You know, I don't think I gave you a name..."
The vampire girl shakes her head.
"No, master, you didn't. Do I need a name, master?"

Calling you master? What a good girl. A name would be a suitable reward for recognizing you as her superior.

Looking back at your computer, you begin to type again.

Her name is Rosa.

Thinking a bit more, you add on:

Rosa receives small amounts pleasure from obeying her creator's orders.

That would be a good safeguard if she somehow found a loophole in what you'd so far written about her.

Now you have to decide just how you want to use her to take control of the world. There was the possibility of nigh-omnipotent psychic powers that cause every other human to see you as their ultimate authority. But there were also other ways, literally anything you could think of. Perhaps you could morph her body into that of an invincible, immortal goddess and conquer countries one by one?

So many choices!

"Rosa? I need your advice."

Ross's face lights up, the vampiress bouncing up and down slightly where she sat on your bed.
"What on, master? I'll give you advice on anything if it helps you!"

"I need advice on world domination."

13.title: Help your character (humanoid)

131.content:
You offer your hand to help him, but he calmly refuses. He brushes his smoking jacket, lined with soot, and sits in your favorite cushy chair. His eyes are black but his smile appears sincere. You both eye each other for long moments while waiting for the other to move.

You’re hoping that your long hours writing have made you delusional, that your computer wasn't just destroyed by lightning, which we’re NOT mentioning a character of your design is sitting before you, and that your bottle of “Claude Dugat Griottes-Chambertin Grand Cru” was not just shattered by a supernatural thunderstorm. No, this couldn’t be real. Too much work and not enough sleep. Damn bills. Yes, it must be because it’s tax season.




What do you do?
131.title: Male humanoid

choices: Ignore this insanity and go to bed!
1311.content:
You lean forward and feel his jacket, to make sure it’s real, and come to the conclusion this must be a dream. Well, why not use the opportunity to discuss things with your character? You probably passed out from the wine while ignoring your stack of tax-work next to your lovely computer monitor and this is your sub-conscious attempting to further your work. It’s worth a shot – writers have been known to do more desperate things.

“I didn’t know you smoked.”

From a pouch he thumbs tobacco into a pipe, slips the pouch beneath his jacket, and withdrawals a lighter. After he begins to puff contentedly on his pipe, he smiles. No other words, just a smile, and a feigned smile, at that. You’re beginning to think your protagonist is better suited to be the antagonist.

“Well, I see the second-tier ‘use-you-as-emotional-support’ bid is out the window, eh?”

His smile fades and he takes another puff of his pipe. You watch his eyes slowly take stock of your room.

“Will you speak!?”

“… and say? Unequivocally, we’re faced with an enigma. Mystery Me.”

“Hey, that’s not a bad idea for a –“

“A title? Mm, yes. I believe your reaction was obvious, or is prudence a notion you’ve not yet reflected upon?”

“Your attitude –“

“Is valid, yes, I know. Unlike your shoddy work, I’ve considered the depths of the issue at hand. You’re in denial.”
“Denial? About what? Your character?”

“About my sitting in front of you calmly filling your wrecked house with smoke.”

“Whatever. I figured –“

“That this was a dream and you passed out while NOT doing your taxes? Yes, so arduous a task arranged before you as you try to ignore your poor spending habits and penchant for luxury.”

“So this is not a dream?”

“No, this is not a dream.”

He taps a few ashes on your floor and thumbs a new scoop in. First of all, you never remember adding the Winston Churchill demeanor, and next, what’s with the calm attitude clearly designed to bait you into a conversation? If he weren’t baiting why is he sitting in your favorite chair staining its fabric with the smell of smoke?

“Tell me, if you truly desire to brush the pages with the facets of your personality must you not believe in your character?”

“Well, I created you. I know you’re not real.”

“Therein lay your first mistake: I AM real because you made me. I am what lives within you. What are expressions of a character but expressions of oneself? I did not mean to refer to your creations, however. I meant to imply your character, as in, who you are.”

“I’m not following.”

“To truly believe in a character, which is an extension of oneself, you must believe in yourself. You are attempting to erect a pyramid without a foundation. Tomfoolery.”

“How does this matter?”

He stands and stretches with the ebony pipe hanging from the corner of his mouth. Smoke escapes his nose. His lithe form springs to the door where he stops and turns toward you.

“Belief is power. The gods of old were stories, too, and they leveled cities, inspired technologies, and formed man into nations. They’ll be remembered where you’ll be forgotten. The question should not be whether or not this is real, but whether or not you are.”

With that Parthian Shot he walks how-do-you-do out of your front door and makes his way down the street.

What do you do?
1311.title: Make the first move

1312.content:
"No, its not because its tax season." with an amused smile, the man said. "I am as real as you are."

"Not possible." shaking your head, you said. "You came out of the computer."

"I teleported, using the computer as a receiver." smiling, the man corrected. "I am from a parallel universe and I have come here to ask for your assistance in a very sensitive matter." pausing, he added, "We can make it very well worth your while."

"Why me?" confused, you asked.

"Because you created our world." simply, the man replied. "However, the world you had created is changing due to an outside source, one we believe is bent upon destroying us all."

"How do you know this..." you began to ask, then realized who you were talking to. "You are Oracle, the all seeing and all knowing man."

"Just not all powerful." nodding, Oracle replied. "I see and I understand but I can do nothing to change it on my own."

"You said someone is trying to destroy the world in my story?" mussing, you asked. "There is only three people who know about my story. My girlfriend, Sarah Moore; My best friend, Jake Rogers; and Dr Tom Howard of the research institute downtown."

"Will you help save my world?" looking at you, Oracle asked.

You nodded. "I will try."

Where do you start?
1312.title: A changing world.

1321.content:
Allright, before we begin, do you choose this character?(see below)


Name: Eve Willows

Bio: Her mother died after giving birth to her. Due to a birth defect(maybe), she was born with a tail. Her father raised Eve to be gentle to mostly everyone. However, she had a very traumatic life thanks to her babysitter defiling both her body and her mind. She developed her Fury state and almost killed him. It cannot be seen however, unless you really get her mad. Her dad did give her some therapy, so she is not as bonkers as she was back then. Growing up was hard on her. People bullied her on a daily basis. As such, she was very lonely at ages 5- 11. At age 12 however, Eve made a friend by the name Milly Erson. They became close friends. She has shown but rarely an ability to copy attacks and did not use it for a long time. Eve's body in her early years was considered "childish" by many. At age 18 however, puberty hit her with a sledgehammer. Example: she got MANY boys asking her if she had a boyfriend. Everyone was shocked to know that was the girl they bullied in the past. Eve has been seen using her new power willingly. She is still friends
with Milly to this day.

Chest size: C
Waist size: 30
Hip size: 24

The biggest thing about her is both her tail and eyes. If you look at them, you feel safe and conformable if the color is gray. If they are yellow though, RUN! She will calm herself down if this happens. (Unless she doesn't want it to end)

Personality: Tomboyish

VA: Kira Vincent-Davis(ENG), Mai Nakahara(JPN)

If you talk to her in her Fury state , she seems cold and sadistic. If you talk to her in her in her Normal state she is very friendly but a little hotheaded. Eve loves goofing off and is very energetic. Surprising enough, she is a AB honor student. She also love messing with people so trying to befriend anyone is difficult.

Powers: Fury state A.K.A Psycho Eve: She is incredibly vicious makes her ALOT stronger and her tail has been seen growing spikes at the end.
Copy: If she sees an ability she wants, she copies it along with their personality. Think of Emerl from Sonic Battle. She can only copy a person's ability three times.
Living Weapon: Quite literally, (drills,blades,rods,anything) though she will fight fair if her enemy fights fair.

Amused, she thinks your fear is amusing.
1322.content: The problem with trying to help this character in particular was the fact she was a serpentine siren, and a very strong one at that. Well, what does that have to do with anything? It just so happens your at a point in your story where her home was burned to the ground, by humans. Being human yourself, getting close to her at the moment might not be a good idea, at least not until you can get your story revised so this doesn't happen, or something else happens. The last thing you wanted her to do was start singing, you'd have no hope of rewriting her if she even let out a single musical note. You quickly scramble over to your computer and erase at least several day's worth of writing, beginning to completely rewrite the events of the serpent girl. She didn't seem to be stirring at the moment, which was very comforting, it gave you time to think and type faster than you ever have before. After several hours of rapid, frantic typing, you'd revised a plot that had taken you several weeks to compose to this point. You were sweating, your breath still heavy. There was only one thing really bugging you, in the back of your mind, What if the change wouldn't take immediate effect? What if it took some time for her to undergo the change. There's a soft hiss behind you, and your body tenses up. Turning around, you stare straight into the sparkling, amethyst eyes of this girl, Micaela if you can recall her name. She stands up, her lengthy serpent body whipping around her as she quietly sat back on her body, staring at you with a(n) _____ expression.
1322.title: Are you kidding? Help yourself first!

choices: Tackles you, it was a ruse!
Yawns, she must be tired right now.
13222.content:
The siren rubbed her head, groaning softly as she blinked a few times, "Oooh, my head." Hesitating, you fearfully spoke up, "Hey, are you alright?" She nods quietly, rubbing her temples. This gives you a chance to really look over the fruits of your labor. Micaela really embodied the qualities of a siren. Her hair was a striking sapphire color, and cascaded down behind her shoulders. The way her body was made, anything sensitive was hidden underneath an organic 'dress' which, in reality, was comprised of smooth skin-like growths. Her voice was soft, silky, just listening to her speak calmed your nerves and made you slightly dizzy. Of course, the best part of her body was her tail. About ten feet long, the far end of her tail was like stained glass, and caught even the dim light of the computer and caused her tail to shimmer and glisten, changing colors whenever it moved. Truly, you'd never laid eyes on anything more beautiful in your life.

"Nnh, why does my head hurt so much!?" Her frustration caught your attention as you looked back up at her face, seeing the clear distress she was in. Easy now, you though to yourself, don't startle her. Sadly, the minute her eyes focused on you again, she leaped back and yelped in surprise, her voice beginning to stutter, "Wha, who are you? Where am I!? What's going on, why can't I remember anything?" Honestly, you felt bad, seeing her like this. She was usually a calm, temperate, and kind lady. Seeing her confused, panicked, and obviously suffering from amnesia, tugged at your heartstrings. "Relax," you cautiously said, hesitantly holding out your hand, "Your in my home, and I'm just a humble writer. There's nothing to be scared of, just breathe and relax, okay?" Nothing to be scared of? Maybe not to her, but your heart was pounding at the moment, she was capable of doing all sorts of things, and you seriously hoped she calmed her nerves and regained her usual composure. You kept gently talking to her, slowly easing her nerves as she eventually got a grip and let out a light sigh, her eyes now expressionless and unable to show any trace of what was there just minutes ago. "Forgive me," she started, "For panicking like that. It's clear that you have no intent to turn me into a trophy, so I suppose you're worth trusting. My name is Micaela." As she says this, she quietly bows, she truly was a courteous soul. You begin to walk closer to her when she suddenly...
13222.title: Welcome to Earth!

choices: Give Micaela some chocolate from a mug
132222.content: Micaela yawns and sleeps on the floor serenely, she must be tired.
132222.title: Yawns, she must be tired right now.

choices: Started to make out with you.
Open her mouth wide, she was going to eat you!
1322221.content:
You let out a soft sigh, poor girl must be tired. You would've carried her to your bed to rest, but she was honestly a heavy creature, and you had nowhere near enough strength to lift that entire body and carry it across the house. Just thinking about it made your entire body sore for a few seconds. Instead, you disappeared out of the room and moved across the darkness of the house, going into your bedroom and opening a closet that had a few extra blankets and pillows, in case you ever had guests (which never happened.) You returned to the office and gently lifted up the serpent's head, moving the pillow under it and lying her back down. You then draped the large blanket over as much of her body as you could. Smiling a little, she gripped a corner of the blanket in her sleep and pulled it against her rather plump breasts, her tail lightly giving the ground a slap, a signal of her enjoyment. Seeing this brought a warm smile to your face, she may be a terrifying, mystical, and at times zealous woman, but she was also very majestic, beautiful, and, at times like this, adorable. You placed your hand atop her head and gently rubbed it in a soothing way, whispering to her, "Sleep well." Before deciding to hit the hay yourself. The few extra hours of revising you just put yourself through had really worked your brain. You saved your work on the laptop and quietly shut it, before tip-toeing out of the room and going to bed, slipping under the covers and quickly dozing off.

Oddly enough, you had a dream as you rested, one of Micaela. However, unlike the sometimes lovely dreams you had, such as the one that spawned your wondrous creation who was now resting on the other side of the house, this seemed to feel more erotic. The woman was quickly advancing on you, a hungry glimmer in her eyes as she backed you into a corner. Playfully, she giggled as her tail began to slip its way up around your legs, "There we are, darling," She spoke in a sultry voice, her gaze lowering a bit as she placed her hands at your sides and gently rubbed your hips, "There's no need to run, you know you want this, as badly as I do." You could feel your cheeks getting hotter as her face slowly moved within inches of yours, her eyes shimmering like stars as her entire serpent body had coiled itself around you, preventing any kind of escape. Her tongue slowly trailed over her lips, and she closed the gap and...
1322221.title: The fruits of one's labor.

choices: You scold her and Micaela stops
You seem to be writing a new paragraph...
13222212.content:
Micaela giggles childishly as she slurps her lips, a stray hiss exiting her sly mouth as she opens wide, as you gaze into her cavernous maw, you realise that you can turn the tables on Micaela, but it all depended on whether you wanted to scold her or not. You would back away as your creation playfully smiles at you,
"Master, I'm hungry..." says the siren as she seems to be rather sheepish for now.
13222212.title: Open her mouth wide, she was going to eat you!

choices: You decide she's too dangerous to have around
1323.content:
You decide to name the female... You gently shake the virgin, feminine body awake, she blinks mutedly and... yawns.
"What is your name?" the creator asked, "Do you even have a purpose?" When she doesn't reply, you decide to name her later...
1323.title: Does it have a name?... is it alive?

13231.content:
At last, your character gives a reply...
"My name is..."
13231.title: Her name is...

132311.content: "Odaxitar?" You question, startled? Her violet hair shimmers incandencely... "You're alive?" You drop to your feet, as the nimble footed cambion also mimics your movement. She succeeds but just not as agile. "You were a female magician in your former life." Her pointed ear twitches. "That is correct," she states in a frosty demanour, kind of like an ice queen. "And where is this so called firking place?" She seems distracted for a moment, better make it quick...
132311.title: Odaxitar, the Ice queen

choices: Odaxitar storms off in a bad mood
1323111.content:
"So, before you answer, Odaxitar, can you answer me this?" you ask your creation kindly, "If life is just a dream, are you just a fragile butterfly who dreamt that she was awake? Or is the butterfly awake instead?" Odaxitar halts for a moment before her eyes glowed red briefly, as if angry at your query, but her aggressive tendencies are compounded by her logical mannerism as she stares at you.
"What is the meaning of the butterfly question?" her emotionless tone seems rather put out by your quoting of a famous philosopher. You smile at your confused creation.
1323111.title: A paradoxical question

13231111.content:
As if on cue, thunder and lightning flashes as Odaxitar thinks about the question, before narrowing her silver eyes at you and storming off into the distance- apparently complaining about your perchant to quote philosophy at random moments.

Shortly afterwards, a light would shine from your computer laptop, as yet another figure fizzles and drops at your feet. Apparently, Olapen (Odaxitar's other half, a good and jolly chaotic mage) and Misako (plant-alien disguised as a green-haired female humanoid) had also decided to join you on your quest.

"Erm," Olapen responds, purple hair twirling, "I don't know where we are." SCHWFFHHH! You hear the sound of a katana sliding out of its sheath and being laid at the base of your neck as Misako snarls loudly, golden eyes blazing...

"Tell us where we are, I command you!" Misako barks out an order
13231111.title: Odaxitar storms off

choices: "Yes, my lady. I hear and obey."
1323112.content:
Despite her obvious unwillingness to care much about her current situation at hand (the one involving herself suddenly materialising into this world!), you try to explain her new situation to her... But just as you were about to, Odaxitar suddenly gasps in astonishment and scrabbles onto the floor, picking up a tiny ornament and examining the found object in all it's intricate details: it's a pencil sharpener. Although, it's not exactly very easy... You know... considering she was a cheerful Mage in her previous life... Whether or not she has carried powers over into this world still remains a mystery, even to you! You've got to be careful though, she had a hair-trigger temper that could decimate anyone else if you 'irritated' her too much. Her own scarlet red and gold trimmed skirt swept the floor.
As if on cue, Corey Hart's Sunglasses at Night blared on the radio.

You don't have any words, clearly the action girl you've always intended her to be, but seeing her 'in the flesh' was amazing to say the least. Odaxitar takes off her sunglasses, revealing her silver eyes, it skitters onto the desk...
"This... uh.. well..." You manage speak up as she now seems to be distracted by the bobble-headed hula-doll on your desk, "...this is my.. office, where everything is kept untidy." You motion to the stack of papers precariously wobbling on the edge of the desk.
"Uh huh..." she uncaring replies as she starts flicking the springy head. You sweat already as you note her pert muscular frame... Flashing sharp jackal-like fangs
"Um... anyway, you were... well, you..." you start to stutter, having 'a bit of a hard time' trying to find the right 'words' to say directly to her, "... You uh... came from my desktop computer."

"Hmmm..." was all Odaxitar replied as grabbed your bobble-head and started 'playing' with it, watching the swinging motion with her darting eyes. She's clearly not taking any of this very seriously. Finally, you nervously clear your throat and try again to explain the situation to 'her' in very simple words. You grab her already ice-cold hands, and stare back at her with wonder and trepidation.
"The truth is, gal... I created you." You proclaim, despite your current audience's distraction.

"...Created me?" Odaxitar mumbled uninterested as she still jiggled your bobble-head around, a pert little fang poking out of her mouth. She had bags under her eyes, indicating an induced insomnia. "Hah. Like I'll ever believe that...! Was I borne out of your own inward 'anger' and personal 'issues' with your life?" she managed to mock you with a knowing smile. You gulp and turn away from her, It seems she knows too much

"That's right," you answered, "you are an artificial life-form that I made 'come to life'. I imagined you in my notes, I already 'thought' you up for many years, and with the power of this sanctified computer, I assembled bits of artificial data and created you out of sheer nothing! So I guess in a smart way, that kinda makes me like a practical Goddess or something!" Well... perhaps that was the best way to explain it to her...!
Or perhaps not... you STILL didn't get her attention!
"God... right..." she consulted her diary that materialized out of nowhere and scribbled it down. No response, even as her tiny fang curled out of her mouth. You are scared to say the next sentence.
"Anyways, since I was the one that created your body, I guess that means I'm your new Master, right?"

"!!!!" Uh oh. THAT got her undivided attention! She dropped your bobble-head on the ground and turned her head to you, "Master?"
"Uh.. yeah?" you stutter to her as she glared with confounded and despair, it seemed like you snapped her fragile mind already.
"MASTER?!" Odaxitar responds in a rather stormy voice- something inside told you she didn't like hearing those words from you!
Odaxitar grabbed you by the collar, "You honestly expect ME, the great Odaxitar," she flicked her violet hair proudly, "to bow down... to the likes of YOU?!" You shoulda known you'd have a problem with that. She laughs evilly, as if she was already considering something violent...

You tremble as you pointed to your computer touchscreen, "W-Well... a..according to the rules on the computer screen, the creation is supposed to obey the orders of the creator-" Before you finish speaking there was a thunderstorm brewing outside as lightning flashes suddenly.
*Fwoosh!* *KAABOOOOOMMM!!!* A gigantic black fireball bursts from Odaxitar's fingertips and blew your computer to smithereens! Yikes... It looks like Odaxitar summoned a lightning storm!

"T-T-THAT WAS A $1, 500 COMPUTER YOU JUST DESTROYED!!" you shouted against your better judgement. Sure enough, she just sneered at your little outburst.
"Collateral damage is gonna be the least of your firking worries, MASTER!" she snapped as her glittering grey eyes stared right into your own soul, "right now, we need to discuss your pecking order in this situation." With one quick thrust, she pushed you right to the ground with another loud, reckless and haughty laugh!
"I am the all-powerful, yet very demonic cambion magician, Odaxitar!" She pointed to herself rather proudly (in a coldly frigid manner), then pointed down to you in a cynical yet logical way, "YOU are the miserable lowlife that seems to be too stupid to realize its place in nature! YOU are not MY master! If anything, I am YOUR new master! I dont bow to YOU. YOU bow to ME! Understand? Don't be afraid to switch your blade on me if you have to." she says with a rather cocky, overconfident overtone.

Oh dear... you inadvertently created a demonic and nightmarish monster! Not only does she refuse to serve you, she still wants YOU to serve HER! But... that's not part of the rules of Creation, is it?! You see a second figure slumped down in the corner of the room, with dizzy eyes, Odaxitar just steps over the shadowy figure.

"I said 'Do you understand'?!" Odaxitar asked one more time, "say 'Yes, my lady. I hear and obey!' Go on! SAY IT!"
1323112.title: The Pecking Order

choices: This is REALITY! you tell her
Seek for advice from your friends
13231121.content:
You inwardly cringe when you realised... that YES, her own story-powers did carry over into this world... And she seemed a little ego-centric -or you created her to be- but still, when your parents realise that your creation just destroye-
"WELL?" your creation says, impatient for your reply, "I'm still waiting" You realise that for once you would have to be subversive and pretend to obey her for the sake of peace and sanity (and that may not be much as your computer is on the fizz). So you state quickly that you shall be placated "My lady I hear and obey." At this Odaxitar calms down a little, but your computer's still a wreck and your parents are coming home soon from work. Then you remember that you created her with control over lightning and you groan with collective angst. This is almost exactly like that Ace Lightning show you used to watch -
"As much as I hate to say it, I'll be grovelling at your feet" you mutter
13231121.title: "Yes, my lady. I hear and obey."

choices: She acts confused about this fact.
132311211.content:
Well, this IS reality... And things like this don't happen everyday, and technically wherever she came from, she's not used to having a female 'master' like you around... So master might be pushing it too far. And you think that whatever happened must've been straight out of a movie. Odaxitar curls up at your feet, angry but still curious about your so called godliness. "So..." she growls, seemingly excited about the new prospects, "Direct me to the nearest potion shop." You blink. "Wace? Can't you get a hint, lowlife?"
"I'm sorry, Odax," you manage to say, "But there are no potion shop where we are." She blinks in confusement, before issuing a few mutters at this. After all, you did know how she worked internally as well as externally... well sorta.

"Then direct me to the holographic visor of whatever year we're in?" Oh yeah, you forgot. In this life-story you've just written for her, she existed in the year 8011, so you have a slight idea of how baffled she is by modern technology. "Yatta? Any movies there are on Hologram 24?" she manages to growl out.
"This isn't the movies." You tell her straight, "This is real life. This is Earth."
132311211.title: This is REALITTTTYYYYY! (not Sparta)

choices: You and Odaxitar hear the game hunter
1323112111.content:
Just then a huge hunter with shady brown hair and a shaggy big beard wearing a suit which was lime green comes in through the open window. He looks keen and sniffs around for a familiar scent, cocking his rifle as he smells of a barnyard as his Indian assistant just chuckles.
"Come, the cryptid is in here," said the hunter, "I can smell it's scent wafting from the streets and it is unmistakable.".
1323112111.title: Brett comes in through the window

13231121111.content:
Odaxitar froze in her tracks as shi seems to stutter before she drags you to the nearby banister.
"Come with me," Odaxitar responds before long. You and her find yourself pounding your sneakers as you escape through the neighbourhood.
"Where are you taking us?" You ask Odaxitar as she smirks wildly, that's not a good sign at all.
"A couple of mad scientists nearby." Odaxitar grins sinisterly, "Brett will never find us there," She knocks on a metal door in a distant alleyway.
"What's the password?" grunts Alfred Schnitzel
"Swordfish," grunts Odaxitar, "Just let us in already!" A few murmurs are heard before there was an eerie swing of a rusty door opening and you find yourself face to face with-
"Auf wielderzehn," responds the famed mad scientist, removing his yellow gloves as he is with a group of other mad scientists. "Had you come here, I would be glad to introduce you all to the Convention of Magicery, a coven of scientists such as myself."

"Cheney Therus," Odaxitar growls, "I have brought company."
13231121111.title: You and Odaxitar hear the hunter approach

132311211111.content:
There would be a loud clatter heard as Cheney's butler would be carrying a pitcher of cold water. Cheney turns his attention to you as Alfred seems to be working on his latest invention, which was a tiny gyro-copter that whirls around the room haphazardly.
"This lab should be activated now," Alfred grunts, "It took some time for the supervillians to construct this hideout but it would do for now..."
"Now, Alfred..." Cheney warns Alfred, "We don't want our guests to get the wrong idea..."
132311211111.title: Welcome to Lab 319

choices: Choose an action movie - one with gladiator fights
Choose a romance movie, the sappy kind.
1323112112.content:
As predicted, your newest creation still seems a bit confused over this tiny little fact called Reality. It's a little too complicated to explain to her in rather thick detail like an human encyclopaedia- and even if you could do this, she'd either not care about this- or she'd turn upon you again! So you know what?! Just simple 'everything else' down for poor her!

"This is currently the year 2014," you explain back to her in a rather sotto voice, "All of that futuristic stuff, holograms, health-potion shops, Virtual Reality Sex-Simulators... they don't even exist yet. Welcome to modern-day Earth." You await her own reaction, it should set in 'her mind' after over half an hour, you smirk to yourself, she wasn't really that smart yet... But you freeze as you remember her own unpredictable mind-set, even if the info took forever, she can learn faster in the end. You've made sure of that.

Odaxitar just stared blankly at you for a few seconds... But whether or not that was a good sign or bad remained a mystery. Knowing the kind of girl you've just 'created', it's probably a BAD thing. But on the plus side, maybe she still might be so oblivious, she'll think she's the first person to have travelled back in time or something! It took another few minutes before Odaxitar drew another conclusion, after consulting her own knowledge about prior events.

"Hmm..." Your confused creation put her very pale hand to her chin, "So the time and world I once belonged in doesn't even exist." She shrugged in another uncharacteristically disappointed fashion, you were again startled, as you can no longer 'read' her actions like you once did... "All gods have mercy! So I'm stuck here in this worthless, ancient civilization, full of these lousy, primitive Neanderthals?!" She crossed her arms and cutely pouted, like a queenly yet spoiled princess.

Oh why did you have to think up someone with such a bratty, arrogant, and snobbish attitude?! Sure those kind of 'characters' are so fun to mess with in fiction, but in your reality, they're just real assholes you'll soon realise! You fell fast asleep for many hours, until... You hear a shriek of "Yatta!" from the kitchen and someone fleeing the kitchen, followed by Odaxitar's angry voice.

"Miss Olapen! Just stay out of the kitchen!" Odaxitar screams, "I told you I don't like waffles for the four billionth time, I prefer pancakes with au cremé blueberry!" Olapen's terrified shrieks continue out of the kitchen into the streets, followed by the kitchen door flying open off its hinges like something from a Looney Tunes cartoon, it was as if a hurricane blew into the room!

"WELL, WHAT ARE YOU LAZING AROUND FOR, YOU LOWLIFE?!" Just then, your angry creation's ear-splitting shriek woke you the blooming heck up! You almost had a heart attack right there! Fortunately, the worst you got was an aching (and burst) eardrum the very next morning... You put on your head-phones hurriedly and hobbled rather slowly downstairs the best you could.

You were such a heavy sleeper- that you didn't notice that the kitchen was now aflame with steam, the living room had books strewn hurly-burly all over the place and the fridge's door torn open by the hinges. Odaxitar was now relaxing next to an untouched electrical toaster, comically munching on a toast sandwich... You gape with astounding surprise, There's not much food left! you panic, more concerned about the food than the situation!

"Wha...what?" you groaned as you rubbed your deaf ear in pain, she walked up and strode to the window facing the park, ripping open these curtains.
"I'm so bored! I've read all those dusty and useless books in your house in less than a day!" she announced, "surely your primitive land has some place of entertainment to go to... Some-place with action, with easy entertainment galore! And blood! I ache for the fight-!"
"Well... there's a movie theatre down the street from here, a five minutes drive!" you suggest rather brightly.
"A movie theatre, you say?" she raised an eyebrow, "you mean one of those- by dictionary definition, 'old visual-story projections they used to show against a wall where large groups of people have to sit so scrunched up together to watch in one big room'?" Oh good, she knows what those are. And fortunately (Or UN-fortunately for you), that confirmation now sparks her interest.

"Very well, Master! Your first order as my new servant is to take me to your movie theatre," She ordered you, "and it better be a REAL good 'movie' ticket... Or all the primitive plastic-surgery in this world won't ever fix what I'll do next to you!" she glares back, ...IS THAT A REAL THREAT?! IS SHE EVEN ALLOWED TO DO THAT TO YOU?! Nonetheless, you dare not risk her breaking the new rules if you disobey your dear Odaxitar.
"Alright, let's go..." you mumble, sloppily putting on a coat.
"*AHEM!*" she cleared her throat, emphasising that you're still forgetting something from 'her highness' incarnate.
"What now?" You manage to roar back.
"I demand that you carry me there," she demanded, "on your back!" ON YOUR BACK??!!! Ugh... she was just born a few hours ago and already she's getting on your nerves! You groaned again and leaned down, giving her more room to climb on you....

You struggled, strained and walked down the street with Odaxitar riding on you piggyback! She was very heavy and like a boulder... You try to ignore the creepily odd stares you're now getting from whispering neighbours and other passer-bys, but it's kinda tough... You crawl to a stand-still.
"C'mon! Move faster, Master!" she ordered as she taunted, "I cant stand being out in this freezing cold weather any longer!" SHE cant stand it?! YOU have to endure it while giving HER a piggy-back ride! And you're already weak...

"J...just a little further," you whisper to yourself, "just a... hah... little further!" Thankfully it wasn't a long walk before you finally reached the theatre two hours later. "O-O-Ok! We...we're here!" You manage to collapse, gasping under her weight. "Why couldn't we just take a train from the station?!" You started to regret writing her storyline...
" 'Bout firking time," she muttered as she jumped agilely off you like a jaguar, "what are we watching now, Steph?"

Quick question: What kind of movie do you think Odaxitar is interested in seeing? Choose carefully. You remember the threat she gave you if she doesn't ever like the movie!
1323112112.title: Always Great to Make Friends!

13231121121.content:
You choose an action movie, and Odaxitar reacts with excitement then utter randomness (and glee) as she watches with rapture. She likes it, you can tell. You grin inwardly, maybe she'll treat you better afterwards. Despite her inital complaints, once you explained the story to her, she got involved with the movie characters and the ending... But somehow, her edginess seemed to have worn off somewhat, she's acting a bit calmer afterwards. But straight after the movie, she reverts back to her usual attitude, minus the mean and selfish bits (well, temporarily anyway)...

"Well," you comment, what did she think of it? She liked it obliviously. But she seems distracted again as she started walking with you, by all the cars and stuff. She seems scared of the cars?! good grief... Just then your average... snake-man sneaks up from behind you, "Sevlyn!" you manage to stutter, recognising the shapeshifter from one of your fiction
13231121121.title: The exciting bit

choices: You sense something is about to happen.
132311211212.content:
Oh great, just when you think you were safe, one of the quasi-human villians from one of your stories turned up! And he had the ability to turn into a cobra, to your detriment. But luckily, you know he's only after rats or large mice, but he still had the ability to spit poison or tackle you at his full height. You nod to your other creation and without a word the twin nanobot blades spring up from her knuckles. FWPTTT! Scwpp! Svelyn looks in shock, as his scaled abodomen topples sideways, he didn't seem to know what to do in this situation. He hisses with anger.

"FWSSS! Yoooou!" he demands at you, pointing a clawed finger at you both, "I shall get you both! As soon as I contact my other cohorts of morphers," he growls. Odaxitar laughs obstinately at Svelyn's plight and threatens him some more, but he can do nothing in the meantime. Svelyn isn't impressed at either at you, but tries to call Mattheus, his partner on the mobile phone. Odaxitar smashes the mobile phone with her fist before he could do anything. He glares helplessly at both at you.
But you are certain he has some tricks up his sleeves...
132311211212.title: The slice of the Snake-man

choices: You send a text back to them
You ask Odaxitar to accompany you
1323112112121.content:
"So," Odaxitar confirms, "That was a rather... easy target. I just had to protect you, seeing as you are a Goddess and all." She wipes her blades onto her outfit, unmindful of the blood which streams. You chuckle awkwardly, but you have your confirmations. You watch as Svelyn limps away, cursing and scaring some other people which just walked by.
"Hah, you think I'm a Goddess/Master?" you state, "I'm just your average teenager. Or I was..." you trail off before handing her a mobile phone. "You know how to use this?" you inquire, Odax just looks blankly at this: 'Wace? What is this contraption?'
"For a five-thousand-and-twenty year old mage/bounty hunter, you're not very smart - but you can learn." you testify for her.
"So I just... Interact with this? Holograms are much simpler to utilise," she comments, pressing a random button.
She scrolls down the menu, fascinated until she reaches the message section. "Primitive but effective. Oh - there's a message for you! Something about an emergency."

You blanch out at the text message - 'helphelphelphelp - Diaglo isn't available right now. Please contact ASAP about these whereabouts. Jykurio! U got to help meh! I'm tripped in the second storey of dah building... AND I CNT GET OUT! Firking evalators! GAHH!' and one from poor Olapen: 'Kayo was looking for you, said something about keeping in touch sometime. Sorry, and srlsy. ROFL.' Wow, these Creations are learning very quickly.
1323112112121.title: Text message fun

choices: Shoo crowd away from the 'celebrities'- talk to them private
13231121121211.content:
You agree to meet your creations at the local shopping centre, but there seems to be some complications. Firstly, there is a long queue of customers convinced that Kayo was a movie star of some sort and the paparrazi had gathered to take 'pictures' of Kayo. "Now now, one at a time," warns Kayo wanely, not letting the crowd touch him but he was secretly enjoying the attention near the fountain. "AAAAAAAA!" squeals all the people, convinced he was a newbie movie star. Heh. Of all things!
"Halt!" said a police man, "Do you have an ID card?" Kayo paused at this, before he looked unquestionly at the human police man.
"Do I have a card," Kayo slightly mocks, "I do have one, constable... Kevin Ludo." He reads the name card off the police's jacket. "Here have a look. I guarantee that all your insufferable questions shall be answered." Sheesh, he's developing a personality that seems to be evolving rapidly. You've never programmed him to think that way! You glower at your creation.

Although now you think about it, being an actor would be a perfect role for most fictional characters, because they always tend to act out a specific role according to which story they're currently in, usually. So for Kayo to act as a movie star would be perfect as a disguise, and since they're an extension of the original creator's thoughts and willpower... why not?

"... Ah, so your Monsieur Leon Desi." Kevin states, "And you're of age to drink and drive. Well that explains things. Are you famous in your country?" 'Leon' pauses... Then he stammers, at Olapen's provocative dress. She came out in a mink coat and an evening gown.
"Charming," she states, "Look at all the crowd that came to see us."

"Of-of-course." Leon states, a fish out of water. A thought came across your mind, pretend you're from Paris and that you are relatively unknown in Holland, "And I'm from Paris, but not known very well in Holland," he quoted, wording you as if he read your mind, "And this is my girlfriend..."
Wisteria Desi, please let it be...
"Ms. Wisteria Desi," Olapen comments coyly. Your mouth is open. They read both your thoughts. WOW! Odax is unimpressed, "Oh, firk."

Without heistation, you use your GPS signal to detect where Diaglo was, to your irritation he turned out to be located in a set of apartments just a few blocks away... The entire apartment block seems unused and empty for now. The doors are steel-covered.

"COOOOKIIIIEEEEESSS!!!"

Well I'd be happy to see the slimy cretin get what's coming to him off the record!" he say before stepping a short distance aways, giving a parting smirk and a quick hair adjustment, and disappearing in a flash.

"What?" she says cynically, "Haven't seen a genuine stunner before? It ain't dyed at all." she manages to say to the guy who was at the counter. And anything you learn is transferred to my robotic thoughts and persona, I can even change appearance thanks to my nanobots."

Kayo and Odaxitar both had superior expressions on their faces, "Well, we'll leave it up for the others to clean our mess up," commented Kayo casually, "As we're both technically enhanced and superior to our original creator," You back up against the wall as Kayo had a flash of conscience as he lifts up his cyborg arm and their mental link to you soon starts to shatter.
"No," Cyborg Kayo stutters, "My commands are... Ignoring the Assimov's third law, curse you Issac Asimov!" Kayo leans back against the shopping centre's complex, "... I can't decide...." Kayo responds, wincing at Odaxitar helplessly, "for myself."

Kayo's mind was torn between following his creator and following the 'love' of his artificial life, but eventually the life fades from his eyes and he goes into automaton mode, finally he says in a flat tone, "What does my Goddess desire." Your other creation is fairly annoyed by this outcome and kept shaking him to snap out of his funk.
"Firking!" exclaims Odaxitar, waving at a blank cyborg's face "Is there nothing this Master can't do?" she curses in a foreign tongue, probably Prussian... Finally, another person approaches you both,
"Hello. It seems like you're the cause for these isolated incidents," said the person with a cream quill in her dark feathered hat. She was an elderly lady who looked like she could be pushed down by a breeze.
"Are you accusing me of causing these to come to life?" you say in a scalding tone, indicating Odaxitar, who was startled by the lady's arrival. You have never heard such tomfoolery in your life. Tulpa?

"Not at all, this is an interesting phenomenon, that is all. According to the monks of Tibet, your creator have the ancient power of Tulpa!" praises the old lady, "Formed from the third-eye energy of the mindset of all creators."

"Tell me, not her, what the Tulpa is," you insist.

"The Tulpa power is an Thought ability granted to some who are willing to harness the willpower of desires. Whence their creator's sheer willpower is so great, the being is created through their thoughts alone." whispered the ancient lady who appeared as a gypsy, "But not everyone has that ability, used incorrectly, this can bring blessing or ruin."
"Talk, all you do is talk!" yells Odaxitar, slapping the old lady, "Just set it to me and Kayo straight."

"You cannot co-exist without your Master, as long as your master is alive, you have interconnected independence and thought. If anything befalls your Master, you two are doomed to a fate worse that anyone."

"I shall be gone." smiles the gypsy lady, "But seek me," then she vanishes from sight. Kayo snaps out of his trance.
"Is this the end of your world?" exclaimed Kayo. You hope not!

Safer to say there was no victor at all. Thankfully both of them survived. Odaxitar soon got back up off the ground, dusting herself off. Despite a bit of dirt and debris on her, the only thing that was hurt was her own pride. Cyborg Kayo, now fearing for his Olapen's life immediately dashed over to his little 'girlfriend' and helped her off the ground (you start to snicker). It's not gonna be long before Round 2...

You narrow your eyes. You can't tell what gender they are, though they do look more male than female. You can already tell who this is. You always referred to them as a "him," because they used to be male. It's a long story.

Your character suddenly rouses himself with a start. He jumps to alertness. You size him up. He looks a lot like you expected.

Dark, dark hair, kept short in no particular style. A strange set of clothes, a clean light color despite the circumstances of his arrival. A pair of light jeans, more white than blue, and a pure white hoodie with a dark yellow insignia on the front. The hood is usually kept down. A look at his face shows his glasses, clear and clean. Cleaner than your own glasses, to your chagrin. You already know what the glasses are-they're automatic darkening lenses, except rather than becoming sunglasses when it's bright out, they tend to become sunglasses when your character does something cool. Just a bit of an in-joke, you guess.

You aren't sure how to greet him. He isn't sure how to greet you. All around, it's kinda awkward.

1331.content:
"Where am I?" he says suddenly, his baritone voice breaking the silence. He looks confused but ready for your answer.

"You're in my house." You answer him with the first thing that enters your head.

"...Fair answer. Who are you?"

"I'm a Creator. Specifically, well, yours. You are my original character. You somehow entered my world. And kinda broke my computer. Thanks."

"...Huh."

"..I expected more of a shock from you than that."

"Well, I always wondered if my world was a simulation. I guess this confirms it, in a way, though being an OC is slightly different than being a simulated being."

"So, there's your answer."

"I have another question for you."

"Shoot."

"To put it simply... Why is my world terrible?"

"Ah, you mean your backstory? I put a lot of thought into that."

"Yeah, I'd assume so considering how much I've gone through. Seriously."

"Well, to put it simply, every hero needs a reason behind their strengths. Yours had to be especially bad, for several reasons." You think back on his backstory.

"Imagine living in a timeline where your very existence prevents a happy ending. Do you know how bad that feels?" He isn't letting the point go.

"If I hadn't done that, you wouldn't have wanted to prevent other timelines from becoming like yours. You're a Protector. You have to want to protect. And you have to be protecting important things for important reasons. Otherwise, you're not important. And a good character must be important. Otherwise, you have to wonder why he's there."

"I guess that's fair. But why go so far as to give me a basically infinite lifespan but have me suffer for infinity as well?"

"So you would want to protect infinitely. You don't want to let other timelines become like yours because others can't handle what you went through. Not even I could handle what you went through. In many ways, though I am your Creator, you are stronger than I will ever be."

"...Arguing against you is probably pointless. You know my motivations more than I ever could. So I will leave it at this. I'm here. What now?"

1342.title: Female

choices: She wants you to make a few changes to her

13421.content:
You couldn't believe it. How was this possible? You had been writing, then something happened, and the character you were writing about was sucked into your bedroom.

The worst part about all of this was that you had been writing about a goddess. You had created deity.

The tall anthro dolphin begins to stir, before standing up to her full height, towering over you, her head barely a foot from the ceiling. Despite her imposing appearance, you had made her benevolent in the story you had started to write, so hopefully she wouldn't burn you to a crisp or something. Noticing your worried expression, she kneels and lowers her head to the same level as your, before saying in a soothing voice, "Do not worry, little one. I mean you no harm. I am the goddess Aquaria. May I enquire as to who you are, and where we are?

However, she catches sight of the computer screen behind you. "Oh? Writing, are we?" she teases slightly, but her face drains of her grey skin colour when she reads the description of the universe you had intended her to inhabit before she became real. She stands back up at her full height, breasts bouncing from the sudden movement, and you gulp, thinking she would use her powers to assault you after revealing her world to be a lie.

Instead, she starts whispering to herself, thinking aloud. You glance at your description of the busty dolphin goddess. Yep, thinks aloud. Aquaria moves your chair to the right and crouches next to you, pointing to a medium sized paragraph describing the vast emptiness of space before Aquaria and her sisters filled it with galaxies, stars and planets. "That...that paragraph was...in my head, when I came into being."

She regards you with a kind of suspicious awe for a moment, before reaching a conclusion within her mind. "There's only one possibility that makes sense. You must be the creator. When me and my sisters came into existence, we knew that someone had created us, just by writing us into existence, so that out universe would be looked after properly..."

She stares into space, not sure what to think about meeting the creator of her universe. "Are you okay, Aquaria?" You ask, before her eyes flick over to you and she smiles slightly, before saying "Yes, creator. Thank you...", and engulfing you in a hug afterwards.

Her grey skin was very warm, and squeaked slightly whenever you moved in her embrace, as her breasts were...large, to say the least. You would have put them at a H cup size. You didn't remember writing her to be so busty.

Aquaria sets you down, before asking you something...
13421.title: Aquaria

134212.content:
"What can you tell me about your world, creator?"

Thinking of how to phrase your reply, you begin to talk about Earth. "It's around... Fourteen and a half billion years old? Yeah, somewhere around that amount of time. I think I have a map somewhere if you want to have a look at the land masses. A few history books, as well. Uh..."

You begin to think about current events you could talk about. "There's a couple of wars going on. A lot of scientific discoveries over the past few months, a few movies have come out recently... That's all I've got right now. Sorry, Aquaria."

You hear a knock on the door downstairs, and recall you had ordered a package a few days ago. "Hold on a sec, Aquaria. I'll be back in a bit." You say, and head downstairs to open the door.

Does Aquaria change anything about herself while you are gone?

13421211.content:
You rush into your bedroom to find Aquaria still tapping away on your keyboard, before she saves the changes she made to herself. "What did you do, Aquaria?!" You angrily demand. She beams at you before standing at her new height of nine feet tall, the raised ceilings giving her more than enough clearance. "Oh! Creator! I changed myself so that any world I am on will be peaceful. You did mention that you had wars, after all..."

"And the height increase?" You question her, causing her to blush. " well, I'm usually several hundred feet tall. I felt kind of... Small. "

Not sure if Aquaria's aura of peace actually works, you switch on the TV and turn to a news channel, halfway through a report. "-have agreed to meet and discuss preparations to both sides, and a permanent ceasefire has been called between the two warring nations."

You collapse onto your sofa, running a hand through your hair. Aquaria sits down next to you on the now reinforced furniture (how did she mange to do that by changing herself? Did she have an aura of furniture augmentation, now?) and places you on her lap, running a soft finger down the length of your whole spine. "Don't worry, creator. Everything is nice and peaceful now. No more real blood, only in books and stories and games now. And I'm pretty sure you need your rest."

She genuinely smiles as you look up at her grey dolphin face. "Rest, creator. The worlds will go on without you, I will make sure of it." She layer you onto the sofa as you drift off into sleep.

Does she make any more changes while you are asleep?
13421211.title: Dolphin-goddess caused peace

13422.content:
You barely have time to react before the anthro Labrador jumps onto you, both of you falling onto the floor. You attempt to crawl backwards but she locks you into a hug, her E-cup sized breasts pushing into your chest as she does so. She hugs you again, tighter, nuzzling your chest as she lays on top of you, looking almost as if she is ready to fall asleep the and there.

And sleep on top of you she does, the affectionate Labrador laying on top of you, her golden fur keeping you warm. Despite your best attempts, you could not wake her, and she was extremely heavy, although thankfully not to the point of discomfort, but it was an impossible task to try and shift her.

Then you remember what you had written her character as. She had been an extremely loyal and affectionate pet to the main character, who was a human. Perhaps she viewed you as her master? It would explain all of the hugging and nuzzling.

But, as soon as you are in danger, that ends and she goes into a mood or phase that makes the majority of those about to be on the receiving end, sh*t themselves.
skills:again, hand to hand and weapon combat, not good at cooking but makes a great decoy, and capable of deception that no angel should be capable of.
weapon: angelic silver tech lance: griffon

155311111.content:
Alberta the deer materialises in your living room, with a huge salmon at the end of his fishing line. The huge salmon wobbles erratically before dropping to the floor, writing its scaly body. Alberta snorts at you happily as his antlers were seen to be newly sprouting.
"Hello," Alberta remarks in a slow voice, "Fancy some fish, I heard they're plentiful this year!"
155311111.title: Alberta caught a large salmon...

15533.content:
You then noticed that the mass or figure that was in the room suddenly disappeared, and then you wonder if your typing really did work at all. “What, that was a huge waste of a paper. I guess I was just seeing things. I guess when I type so much, I start to see things.” You said to yourself just as you thought you saw the static forming out into a creature, but then you turn to still see the static screen right back. “Well, I guess its time to start going straight back into....”

Before you were able to continue your writing. You felt a thud in the ground that shook it a bit. You then started to wonder. “What was that?” You wondered and then suddenly you notice the water on your glass was started to thud again, and the thuds got even more intense, shaking the ground almost like that of an earthquake. “I was writing about a huge character. Let me see what it is?”

You then went outside just as the thuds started to turn into stomps, and then you saw right before your eyes an enormous shadow looking down on you. You were both in sheer awe and terror as the giant being tower right over you and whatever building that you were living in. “Wow, it is big!!!!!”

So, wanna do a macro story of a huge character?
15533.title: Something BIG?!!!!!!

1553312.content:
Name: Koyuki Atazki
Kaiju Name: Koyukizilla, or Girlzilla
Age: 8
Hair style and color: Medium length black hair
Eye color: Green
Skin: As humaningly white as possible, pale
Height: 175ft
Clothes: Wearing a two piece pink bikini outfit
Powers: Godzilla like roar, laser beam eyes, breathing underwater, and is immune to most weapons
Additional Info: She acts like a total giant monster nut, basically roaring and stomping like Godzilla, and being all mighty and powerful. More in her story later. Let’s just say that for her weakness, only the author can control her, but she is friendly and doesn’t mind being controlled by her master.

The giant young girl looks at the tiny person which is you and then she gives out a Godzilla like roar just as she places her hands on her hips. You were in disbelief and in sheer shock. You admitted you always wanted to make a story with a young kaiju in mind, but a young school age girl in a swimsuit Godzilla sized, well it is strange to say the least.

“Uh, hi there, Girlzilla?” You said to her, nervously.

Koyuki then gets on her knees and looks at you a bit intensely just as she makes her monster noises, and then suddenly she smiles. “Hello there master, is there anything you want me to do for you my friend?”

“Huh?” You asked.

“You are my master, I will do anything you please.” Koyuki then tells you.

Wanna continue with Koyukizilla?

info.brief_description: When 'created' characters unleash into 'real' existence, chaos breaks loose, GP for adds.
info.description:
1. Not much sex, or if there is it should be implied. I lowered the rating a bit...
2. Your character cannot physically harm those existing in the real world, except their creator(s) and or families. Your character has limits to what they can do, as they can't breach their created powers. Birds and animals can be harmed though - :D Think of Refugee From TVland (TVtropes)
3. No god-mode sues are allowed. If no, add some realistic weaknesses to them
4. Anything is allowed, as long as it's in 'tact'. Shrinking, weight gain, endo, vore and other fairly random events from their fictional world can also occur on a daily basis. ^^ No single sentence chapters!
5. Creators can punish their creations if desired, only if the character misbehaves. Sometimes the law of physics can be ignored. If they wish, fusions can occur rarely
6. Character that created starts out with amnesia and can interact with creators and creations in a 'Truman Show' style. Endosomatophillia is allowed here also xD
7. No famous characters from TV show, games, anime or comics/celebrities allowed. If notified, I'll delete those entries.
8. No one-word or one-sentence chapters. Chapters must be detailed and elaborate.

I would appreciate any (even if small) additions and if you have any questions please contact me on writing.com and I'll get straight to it. Any sort of storyline is fine to me- in other words, please ADD something fun and readable. 1,000 gp for the first 10 detailed chapters.
UPDATED: Now up to 5000+ views by now! (and a RECORD 147+ chapters) Keep on going! Thank you! Also helping frillardy with their stories... Let's also give a big warm welcome to Brian Achilles (21) , ForestFire5000 (53) , Scifiwizard (150) , Aperture (1) , infinity421 (36) and dark (10) our newest contributors.
I'll give out 2690 GPs for the next 10 adds. Added more options for those into Furry characters ;)
